metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12066 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
BIRD Internet Routing Daemon before 1.6.4 allows local users to cause a denial of service (stack consumption and daemon crash) via BGP mask expressions in birdc.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-12066` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

bird - 1.6.4-1
bird-bgp - 1.6.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bird package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.4-1').
